ValidationRule.description: Contact field mandatory for record type: T&M and Fix in stage In progress
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName , 'In progress'), ISPICKVAL(StageName , 'Customer'), ISPICKVAL(StageName , 'Approved'), ISPICKVAL(StageName , 'Closed Won'), ISPICKVAL(StageName , 'Closed Lost')), OR(ContactId__c = NULL,ISBLANK(ContactId__c)) )
